imdb.plot outline: As one of the world's most trusted medical centers, Mayo Clinic has joined Gaiam to present this groundbreaking, integrated approach to IBS care. Learn what you need to know about IBS, integrative therapies, diet strategies, gentle yoga to improve circulation and release tension, stress-relieving guided meditation, and easy practical lifestyle tips. Changing the way you live can change the way you feel.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Mayo Clinic Wellness Solutions for IBS: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
plot: As one of the world's most trusted medical centers, Mayo Clinic has joined Gaiam to present this groundbreaking, integrated approach to IBS care.
